reviews.review: Love this game. Have been playing it since not long after release, though with big breaks in between. At the moment I'm caught again. Hunting people is just too good :D
好评，不过杀手得匹配半天

Game is just a lobby simulator. Developers are out of touch and you can see most of their decisions are based on their own ego's and twisted perception of the game, which explains the toxicity. No COMMS in a team based game in 2020. No basic display options or brightness controls. This is an early access at best due to a large number of game breaking bugs and poor map design.
Got chased around a pile of rocks for 2 minutes. Friends did 0 generators. 10/10 would play again.
It takes time to get the hang out the game but once you do, it'll be the only game you would enjoy playing for hours. Cons are that there's bugs, a pretty good amount of bugs.
You wont have fun 7/10 would play agian

I'm not gonna lie, when you first play this game, you will hate yourself, your teammates, and the killer as well. That is all a part of the process, you can be aggressive or immersed, either way just be efficient, do a gen, save a teammate, cleanse a totem, open a chest(maybe), just don't be a wanderer, it makes the game harder for everyone except the killer. That is the best advice I can give for a new survivor. As for killer, same applies, don't let the start of the game push you away, smurfs, toxicity, just know when to go somewhere and when to leave somewhere that benefits you, it takes time and experience to know these points in the match, for both sides. Bottom line, don't let the early game play deter you from wanting to play, there is plenty of fun to be had, of course it is a big grind but in the end it feels so great to get that one survivor you like to P-III 50 with all perks or getting your favorite killers to have the same level. Just don't burn yourself out trying to grind. Give the game a shot, if you are iffy about it, a sale will always come around, happy running and happy hunting and maybe I'll see you in the fog. Catch ya on the flip flop.
Le jeux coter survivant est rendu injouable depuis la maj récente,

4GB ram ile oynamaya çalışıyorum. Yine de çok düşük ayarlarda iyi performans alabiliyorum. Tek başınıza oynarsanız sıkıcı olabiliyor, arkadaşlarınızla oynamanızı tavsiye ediyorum. Bir arkadaş grubunuz varsa kaçırmadan alın derim. Sürekli güncelleme gelmesi bazen bıktırabiliyor. 

7/10.
Du sel et des pleurs. La recette parfaite pour passer un bon moment !

I absolutely love everything about this game. The game requires the players to be skillful, so in order to be good at DBD, you need to play quite a bit. I thoroughly enjoy this play style and hope others can have just as much fun as I do.

Невозможно зайти. По 4 раза раза перезапускаю через alt + f4. Никто ничего не делает. Разработчикам пофиг. Не платите деньги за это говно. 
Прошло 3 месяца, а баг так и не поправлен, зато новые скинчики ввели. Сделает просто нормальный коннект и поиск. На всех форумах об этом пишут. Играть невозможно до сих пор. Заходит одна игра из 10. В остальных случаях только alt + f4

So for some reason it doesn't show all the hours I've put into this game. But that's no biggy, because it's just gonna keep going up even if I have to start over. 

This game is a gem! It brings back my nostalgic love for old killers while introducing new ones. I have screamed like a little girl on more than once running from a killer and have also plenty of times thrown many on a hook with my sweet ol' granny the Hag. But nothing beats killing your friends, chasing them down as a childhood killer you all grew up watching. I'm sad Jason never got in because of their my killer is best and I want my own game mentality. I hope some day they put in the Leprechaun so I can be the lovable little eye poking fiend. I WANT ME GOLD NOW!!!

Spiel ist ganz ok. Nur werden die Killer leider mit jedem DLC stärker und stärker. Beispielsweise kamen jetzt 2 Killer heraus (Ghostface und ONI) die One-Hit-Fähigkeiten haben und gratis zu jedem Update bekommt ihr BUGS dazu. Ein Freund, muss fast nach jeder Runde sein Spiel neu starten und Online ist keine Lösung zu finden.

Leider gibt es in dem Spiel, VIELE Killer die es lieben zu Facecampen oder zu tunneln, worunter der Spielspaß zu leiden hat.
Das Report-System bringt leider bei der ganzen Geschichte nichts.

Dennoch spiele ich gerne dieses Spiel und hoffe auf Besserung.
It is hide and seek. Some people play it like its an Esport smh. (googles) Its an actual Esport? but its just hide and seek O_O Fun game though.
